rows.label: xs33560100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, thank the stars!
You must've spotted my flare, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33560100_MSG0020
rows.name:
I do not think I could have escaped here
under my power alone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33560100_MSG0021
rows.name: Thank you for the timely rescue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33560100_MSG0030
rows.name:
You have come to my aid many times before,
and now it will be my turn to come to yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33560100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Let us bring this fight to an end,
and return home safely![ST:wait ]
